Class VectorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • VectorHelper

  • public class VectorHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Adel on 14/10/2017. VectorHelper Class to make some basic operations on one dimension tables or vectors

    • Method Detail

      • Inverse

        public void Inverse(Vector vec)
        a function that inverse the order of one vector elements
        Parameters:
        vec - the Vector of which we desire to inverse the elements. Exemples: input: 1| 2| 3 |5 output: 5 |3 |2| 1

      • sommeVec

        public void sommeVec(Vector vec1,
                     Vector vec2)
              throws DifferentLengthException
        a function that make the additon of two vectors with the same size and throw an exception if not
        Parameters:
        vec1 - vector of which we want to add the values to those of vec2
        vec2 - vector of which we want to add the values to those of vec1
        Throws:
        DifferentLengthException - Exemples: input: 1| 2| 3 |5 2 |3 |4| 1 output: 3 |5 |7 | 6

      • smallest

        public int smallest(Vector vec,
                    int n1,
                    int n2)
        a function that give the smallest element's index in one interval of values
        Parameters:
        vec - the vector on which we make the operation of research
        n1 - the beginning of the research index
        n2 - the ending of the research index
        Returns:
        the index of the smallest value. Exemples: input: 1| 9| 7 |5 |8 |4 index 2 index 4 output: 3

      • triVec

        public void triVec(Vector vec)
        a function that sort the elements of one vector
        Parameters:
        vec - the vector of which we want to put the elements in order. Exemples: input: 2 | 4 |3 | 1 output: 1 |2 |3 | 4

      • setExtrema

        public void setExtrema(Vector vec)
        a function that gives the minimum and the maximum of one vector
        Parameters:
        vec - the vector of which we desire to find the min and the max. Exemples: input: 1| 2| 3 |5 output: min 1 max 5

      • multiScalaire

        public void multiScalaire(Vector vec,
                          int scal)
        a function that multiplicate all the values of one vector by a number
        Parameters:
        vec - the vector of which we want to multiplicate the elements
        scal - the number that we multiplicate the values by. Exemples: input: 1| 2| 3 |5 scal 2 output: 2 |4 |6 | 10
